guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • A Windows computer
  • iTunes
  • Speakers
  • iPhone, iPad or iPod touch

lines.text: Get the latest version of iTunes by going to www.iTunes.com and click on "Free Download". Uncheck the boxes unless you want to get updates.
lines.text_raw: Get the latest version of iTunes by going to www.iTunes.com and click on "Free Download". Uncheck the boxes unless you want to get updates.

lines.text: Create a playlist if you only want some music to play, not all of it. To do this, go to File->New Playlist. Then, type in a name for the playlist
lines.text_raw: Create a playlist if you only want some music to play, not all of it. To do this, go to File->New Playlist. Then, type in a name for the playlist

guide.summary: A guide to setting up a home media sever on a windows computer that you can control on an ipod, ipad, or iphone.
guide.title: Setting Up a Home Media Sever
